metadata.name: PowerShell Base64 Encoded WMI Classes
metadata.comment: Detects calls to base64 encoded WMI class such as "Win32_ShadowCopy", "Win32_ScheduledJob", etc.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\pwsh.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('powershell\.exe', 'pwsh\.dll')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('vwbpag4amwayaf8auwboageazabvahcaywbvahaaeq')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('caaqbuadmamgbfafmaaabhagqabwb3agmabwbwahka')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('xagkabgazadiaxwbtaggayqbkag8adwbjag8acab5a')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('v2lumzjfu2hhzg93y29we')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dpbjmyx1noywrvd2nvch')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('xaw4zml9tagfkb3djb3b5')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('vwbpag4amwayaf8auwbjaggazqbkahuabablagqasgbvagia')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('caaqbuadmamgbfafmaywboaguazab1agwazqbkaeoabwbia')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('xagkabgazadiaxwbtagmaaablagqadqbsaguazabkag8ayg')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('v2lumzjfu2nozwr1bgvksm9i')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dpbjmyx1njagvkdwxlzepvy')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('xaw4zml9ty2hlzhvszwrkb2')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('vwbpag4amwayaf8auabyag8aywblahmacw')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('caaqbuadmamgbfafaacgbvagmazqbzahma')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('xagkabgazadiaxwbqahiabwbjaguacwbza')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('v2lumzjfuhjvy2vzc')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dpbjmyx1byb2nlc3')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('xaw4zml9qcm9jzxnz')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('vwbpag4amwayaf8avqbzaguacgbbagmaywbvahuabgb0a')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('caaqbuadmamgbfafuacwblahiaqqbjagmabwb1ag4ada')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('xagkabgazadiaxwbvahmazqbyaeeaywbjag8adqbuahqa')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('v2lumzjfvxnlckfjy291bn')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dpbjmyx1vzzxjby2nvdw50')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('xaw4zml9vc2vyqwnjb3vud')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('vwbpag4amwayaf8atabvagcazwblagqatwbuafuacwblahia')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('caaqbuadmamgbfaewabwbnagcazqbkae8abgbvahmazqbya')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('xagkabgazadiaxwbmag8azwbnaguazabpag4avqbzaguacg')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('v2lumzjftg9nz2vkt25vc2vy')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dpbjmyx0xvz2dlze9uvxnlc')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('xaw4zml9mb2dnzwrpblvzzx'))))

output.summary: Detects calls to base64 encoded WMI class such as "Win32_ShadowCopy", "Win32_ScheduledJob", etc.
